mapper.insert: INSERT INTO km_s_pub (id, pub_set, provider_id, m_sub_id, ins_id, version, visibility, stability, operator_id, begin_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{pubSet}, #{providerId}, #{modelSubId}, #{insId}, #{version}, #{visibility}, #{stability}, #{operatorId}, #{beginTime})
mapper.select: SELECT spub.provider_id FROM km_s_pub spub WHERE spub.provider_id LIKE #{provider_id_pattern} AND spub.end_time IS NULL GROUP BY spub.provider_id

SELECT ssub.pub_set, ssub.provider_id, ssub.visibility, ssub.m_sub_id, ssub.stability, ssub.version, msub.group, msub.name FROM km_s_pub ssub, mm_m_sub msub WHERE ssub.provider_id = #{providerId} AND ssub.m_sub_id = msub.id AND msub.group LIKE #{group_pattern} AND ssub.end_time IS NULL GROUP BY ssub.pub_set
